QuestData.Title: The Wolf and The Kodo
QuestData.Description: My "associate" here has some plans for you that I don't agree with. His actions are hasty, uncontrolled, and irresponsible, and you may end up paying for them with your life.$b$bBefore you work with Gor, first listen to the tale that I have to tell. It's a moralistic story - a fable - but I believe its lesson will prove valuable. Speak to me when you are ready.
QuestData.LogDescription: Hear the moral of Shin Stonepillar's story.
QuestData.CompletionText: Pay close attention to the meaning behind my words, child.
QuestData.RewardText: The moral of the story: hasty, lazy actions have ruinous results. We mustn't take shortcuts... we must work for our rewards. I've been trying to tell this story to the "Enforcer", but I fear his Hellscream-worshipping skull is a little bit too thick.
